Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends Object
    Class containing all fields and chancecards, as well as methods to query them and manipulate them if neede

        Return whether or not a given Field is owned. Only if it's a property.
        Parameters:
        index - field index to return
        Returns:
        only true if the Field in question is of type PropertyField and owned by someone

        Returns:
